title: The Science of Why Taking Down the Confederate Flag Matters
text:
In a physical sense, flags are just patterns of colored cloth: simple, geometric configurations that fly in the wind. But in a psychological sense, they are much, much more than that. Flags hold a psychic power over people. When we see them, the ideas and groups they represent make a mark on our minds, and can change our behavior.
See the full story at National Journal
